english: Boycott bad experiences, refuse pirated experiences. Be aware of self-defense and being deceived. Visiting experiences is good for your brain, but too much experience visit can harm your health. Manage your time well and enjoy a healthy lifestyle.
translation: Kötü deneyimleri boykot et ve korsan deneyimlerden kaçın. Kandırılma ve kendini savunma konusunda bilinçli ol. Deneyim ziyaretleri zihnin için faydalıdır ancak çok fazla deneyim ziyareti sağlığına zarar verebilir. Zamanını iyi kullanın ve sağlıklı bir yaşam tarzı benimsemeye özen göster.

english: Boycott bad experiences, refuse pirated experiences. Be aware of self-defense and being deceived. Visiting experiences is good for your brain, but too much experience visit can harm your health. Manage your time well and enjoy a healthy lifestyle.
translation: Kötü deneyimleri boykot et ve korsan deneyimlerden kaçın. Kandırılma ve kendini savunma konusunda bilinçli ol. Deneyim ziyaretleri zihnin için faydalıdır ancak çok fazla deneyim ziyareti sağlığına zarar verebilir. Zamanını iyi kullanın ve sağlıklı bir yaşam tarzı benimsemeye özen göster.

description: button label

english: I consent to Roblox’s collection, use, and storage of my voice recording for moderation and safety purposes only.
translation: Roblox'un ses kaydımı yalnızca denetleme ve güvenlik amacıyla toplamasına, kullanmasına ve saklamasına izin veriyorum.

description: A warning to users that changing their username will remove their verified badge status
english: Warning: Changing your username will remove your verified badge status. Are you sure you want to do this?
translation: Uyarı: Kullanıcı adını değiştirmek, doğrulanmış rozet durumunu ortadan kaldırır. Bunu yapmak istediğine emin misin?

description: Bundle
Emotes
Label for the Body category in the Catalog which contains items such as hairs, head and body parts to customize a users avatar.
Label for the Animation category of the catalog which contains items such as animation packages and emote animations.
Label for the Eyebrow category.
Label for the eyelash category.
Text is used as a label for the experience it was made in. For example: Made in Natural Disaster Survival
A prompt given to a user when clicking the ignore all button confirming before they ignore all friend requests.
english: Are you sure you want to ignore all friend requests?
translation: Tüm arkadaşlık isteklerini yok saymak istediğine emin misin?

description: A cancel button used for modals.
A disclaimer for when you click the "ignore all" button on the friend requests page telling users the button will only ignore a max of 300 friend requests per click.
english: Note: This will at max remove your most recent 300 friend requests each time you click the 'Ignore All' button.
translation: Not: "Tümünü Yok Say" düğmesine her tıkladığında bu eylem, son 300 arkadaşlık isteğini kaldırır.

description: MutualFriends between two users
mutual friends between two users.
english: {mutualFriendsCount, plural, =0 {# mutual friends} =1 {# mutual friend} other {# mutual friends}}
translation: {mutualFriendsCount, plural, =0 {# ortak arkadaş} =1 {# ortak arkadaş} other {# ortak arkadaş}}

description: Label for a user that follows you
Label for a user that you are following
action to block a user
Singular form of friends
label for action to unblock a user
Tells the user that camera chat features are available

english: There was a problem submitting your report.
Tell us how you think the asset is breaking the rules of Roblox.
translation: Bu varlığın Roblox kurallarını nasıl ihlal ettiğini düşündüğünü bizimle paylaş.

english: We are unable to respond to each report, but your feedback will help us improve the experience for all creators.
translation: Yapılan her bildirime yanıt veremiyoruz ancak yaptığın geri bildirim, tüm içerik oluşturucuların deneyimini iyileştirmemize yardımcı olacak.

description: Error that appears when hitting max limit to the number of alpha-numeric characters in a user given textbox
english: Your comment must be less than {characterLimit} characters.

description: Allows the user to exit from the Abuse Report Screenshot Review section and go back to the game. Once they restart the report process from that point, another screenshot of the scene in-game is captured.
Shown to the user when they are asked to confirm if they would like to "Retake Scene" i.e. capture another screenshot for their Abuse Report.
english: Help us understand what’s happening around you. We’ll capture the scene the moment you select “Report.”
translation: Etrafında olup biteni anlamamıza yardımcı ol. "Bildir" düğmesine tıkladığın anda ekran görüntüsü alacağız.

description: This action causes the user to leave the Report Abuse form and return to the game/experience.
This action advances the user to the next page of the Abuse Report form.
Title for the Abuse Report screenshot annotation page where the user can tap/click on the screenshot to indicate which user(s) are abusive.
Title for the Abuse Report screenshot annotation page where the user can tap/click on the screenshot to indicate what content is abusive.

Allows the user to exit from the Abuse Report Screenshot Review section and go back to the game. Once they restart the report process from that point, another screenshot of the scene in-game is captured.

Message shown to user below the screenshot captured just before they entered the Report Abuse form. The quoted "Retake" is referring to a button with that label which, when clicked/tapped, will take the user out of the Abuse Report form, and back into the game, allowing them to capture another screenshot by restarting the report process.
english: If the problem is not in this scene, you can “Retake” the screenshot.
translation: Sorun bu görüntüde mevcut değilse ekran görüntüsünü "Yeniden Çekebilirsin".

description: This action causes the currently-previewed screenshot seen by the user to become attached/included with the Abuse Report they are filling out.
This action advances the user from the screenshot preview page of the Abuse Report form, to the page where they can annotate/highlight the screenshot to indicate where/who is abusive.
Used as a label to show legacy, non-layered shirts.
Used as a label to show legacy, non-layered t-shirts.
Used as a label to show legacy, non-layered pants.
Used as a label for a category that contains both Dresses and Skirts.
The Face Chat feature requires a camera to track the user's facial expressions.
The Face Chat feature is unavailable currently.
To use the Face Chat feature, go to the OS settings to allow Roblox client to use the camera.
english: Go to your settings to allow Roblox to use the camera.
translation: Roblox'un kamera kullanımına izin vermek için Ayarlar'ına git.

description: Asset Name
Asset name
First letter of "left"
First letter of "Right"
First letter of "Right" as in "turn right"
This is the front of a person. The user has an avatar which has a front.
This is the back of a person. The user has an avatar which has a back.
Avatar Animations allow the user to have their character or avatar move differently within the game.
VIP servers are private servers which users can create to play only with their friends instead of strangers.
Asset type Head, singular form
Asset type T-Shirt, singular form
Asset type Shirt, singular form
Asset type Decal, singular form
Asset type Model, singular form
Asset type Plugin, singular form
Asset type Mesh Part, singular form
Asset type Game Pass, singular form
Asset type Badge, singular form
Asset type Package, singular form
Asset type Place, singular form
Asset type Left Arm, singular form
Asset type Left Leg, singular form
Asset type Right Arm, singular form
Asset type Right Leg, singular form
Asset type Torso, singular form
Asset type Animation, singular form
Asset type Emote, singular form
Builders club membership type
Builders club membership type
Builders club membership type
Builders club membership type
Premium Membership - this should be translated with the consent of product managers who owns the BC feature. Direct word to word translation might not be accurate.
membership type name
membership type
membership type
label
label
label
label
label - if language supports capitalization, please keep it uppercase
label
label
This signifies a lifetime subscription to builders club or some other product.
use Feature.Support namespace instead
Label for share button.
Prompt for the user to share an invite link to the current experience
Text shown when the share invite link is copied to clipboard on desktop apps
Label for external copy link button
Confirm Button: when an item costs 0 Robux, the confirm button displays this string
Confirm Button: when player's Builders Club level is too low to purchase an assset, the confirm button displays this string and triggers the Builders Club upsell flow
Confirm Button: this is text is displayed on the button to confirm a normal purchase
Confirm Button: when player's Robux balance is insufficient, the confirm button displays this string
Cancel Button: the button to cancel a purchase and dismiss the prompt displays this string
Dismiss Button: when an error occurs or a purchase completes, the button to dismiss the prompt displays this string
Shown when a purchase is in flight, above a three-animating-dots style loading animation
Additional detail text for purchases of free items
english: Your account balance will not be affected by this transaction.

description: Additiona detail text displayed for purchases when in studio, where purchases are faked
english: This is a test purchase; your account will not be charged.
translation: Bu bir deneme satın alımıdır, hesabından ücret alınmayacak.

description: Post-purchase additonal detail text displayed when in studio, where purchases are faked

DEPRECATED - Additional detail text displayed when a player's Builders Club membership is insufficient to make a purchase. As of now, this string will actually have to correctly match up with ConfirmPurchase.UpgradeBuildersClub to avoid confusion. Would be nice to avoid that constraint, or bake it in somehow.
english: This item requires {BC_LEVEL}. Click 'Upgrade' to upgrade your Builders Club!
translation: Bu öğe için {BC_LEVEL} gerekli. Yaratıcılar Kulübü'nü yükseltmek için "Yükselt" düğmesine tıkla!

description: Additional detail text displayed during normal purchase flow, reflecting player's final balance if they choose to confirm the purchase
english: Your balance after this transaction will be R${BALANCE_FUTURE}
translation: Bu işlemden sonra bakiyen ${BALANCE_FUTURE} R olacak

description: Post-purchase additional detail text indicating Robux value after successful purchase.
Addtional detail text displayed on mobile, where an upsell product is preselected for the player. The product likely won't match with the purchase cost of the item, so will prov
english: The remaining {REMAINING_ROBUX} Robux will be credited to your balance.

description: Description text displayed on mobile when canceling an upsell purhcase. Occurs when a player does not have enough Robux, is prompted to buy more, and chooses not to.
english: Your purchase failed because your account does not have enough Robux. Your account has not been charged.
translation: Hesabında yeterli Robux bulunmadığından satın alma işlemin başarısız oldu. Hesabından ücret alınmadı.

description: DEPRECATED - Description text displayed on desktop clients when player does not choose to purchase a builders club upsell (for an item that requires a higher builders club level than they possessed). This should be extremely rare, as there are few assets that have builders club requirements and are sold in games.
english: Your purchase failed because you need a subscription to purchase this item. Your account has not been charged.
translation: Bu öğeyi satın almak için aboneliğe ihtiyacın olduğundan satın alma işlemin başarısız oldu. Hesabından ücret alınmadı.

description: Description text displayed on mobile and console, when a product costs more than any native purchase would provide. For example, an item costing 4000 robux is more expensive than any of our native Robux packages.
english: This item costs more Robux than you have available. Please leave this experience and go to the Robux screen to purchase more.
translation: Bu öğenin fiyatı, sahip olduğun Robux'tan daha fazla. Lütfen bu deneyimden ayrıl ve daha fazla Robux satın almak için Robux ekranına git.

description: Description text displayed on desktop clients, when a product costs more than any single Robux package on our website would provide. For example, an item costing 50,000 robux is more expensive than any of our Robux packages.
english: This item cost more Robux than you can purchase. Please visit www.roblox.com to purchase more Robux.
translation: Bu öğenin fiyatı, satın alabileceğin Robux'tan daha fazla. Daha fazla Robux satın almak için lütfen www.roblox.com adresini ziyaret et.

description: Description text displayed when purchases are disabled. This should be exceedingly rare, and will only happen if purchasing is disabled for all of Roblox.
english: Your purchase failed because In-experience purchases are temporarily disabled. Your account has not been charged. Please try again later.
translation: Deneyim içi satın alma işlemleri geçici olarak devre dışı bırakıldığından satın alma işlemin başarısız oldu. Hesabından ücret alınmadı. Lütfen daha sonra tekrar dene.

description: Description text displayed in the case of an unknown error when we do not know the name of the item to be purchased. Usually would only happen if the game prompts the user to buy an invalid item.
english: Your purchase failed because something went wrong. Your account has not been charged. Please try again later.
translation: Bir şeyler ters gittiği için satın alma işlemin başarısız oldu. Hesabından ücret alınmadı. Lütfen daha sonra tekrar dene.

description: Description text displayed in the case of an unknown error, generally something wrong with the network.
english: Your purchase of {ITEM_NAME} failed because something went wrong. Your account has not been charged. Please try again later.
translation: Bir şeyler ters gittiği için {ITEM_NAME} satın alma işlemin başarısız oldu. Hesabından ücret alınmadı. Lütfen daha sonra tekrar dene.

description: Description text displayed in the case of an error retrieving account info, generally something wrong with the network.
english: Cannot retrieve your balance at this time. Your account has not been charged. Please try again later.
translation: Bakiyene şu anda erişilemiyor. Hesabından ücret alınmadı. Lütfen daha sonra tekrar dene.

description: Description text displayed in the case of an error retrieving the product, generally something wrong with the network.
english: We couldn't retrieve the price of the item at this time. Your account has not been charged. Please try again later.
translation: Şu anda öğenin fiyatına erişemedik. Hesabından ücret alınmadı. Lütfen daha sonra tekrar dene.

description: Description text displayed when player is prompted to purchase a Limited or Limited Unique item that has no more copies remaining.
english: This limited item has no more copies. Try buying from another user on www.roblox.com. Your account has not been charged.
translation: Bu sınırlı sayıda üretilmiş öğenin başka kopyası yok. www.roblox.com adresindeki başka bir kullanıcıdan satın almayı dene. Hesabından ücret alınmadı.

description: Description text displayed when player is prompted to purchase an item that is no longer for sale
english: This item is not currently for sale. Your account has not been charged.
translation: Bu öğe şu anda satılık değil. Hesabından ücret alınmadı.

description: Description text displayed when player is prompted to make a purchase while logged in as a guest.
english: You need to create a ROBLOX account to buy items, visit www.roblox.com for more info.
translation: Öğeleri satın almak için bir ROBLOX hesabı oluşturman gerekir, daha fazla bilgi için www.roblox.com adresini ziyaret et.

description: Description text displayed when player is prompted to make a purchase that is not allowed because of third party purchase restrictions applied to the Place in question.
english: Third-party item sales have been disabled for this place. Your account has not been charged.
translation: Bu dünya için üçüncü taraf öğe satışları devre dışı bırakıldı. Hesabından ücret alınmadı.

description: Description text displayed when an under-13 player is prompted to purchase an item that is restricted to 13-and-up players.
english: Your account is under 13. Purchase of this item is not allowed. Your account has not been charged.
translation: Hesabın 13 yaşın altında. Bu öğenin satın alınmasına izin verilmiyor. Hesabından ücret alınmadı.

description: Description text displayed when a player is prompted to purchase an Asset or Game Pass they already own.
english: You already own this item. Your account has not been charged.
translation: Bu öğeye zaten sahipsin. Hesabından ücret alınmadı.

description: Description text displayed when a player is prompted to purchase an item that costs 0 Robux.
english: Would you like to take {ITEM_NAME} for FREE?
translation: {ITEM_NAME} öğesini ÜCRETSİZ olarak almak ister misin?

description: Description text displayed when a player is prompted to purchase an item and has sufficient Robux to do so. Immediately below this, a price indicator is displayed, hence the dangling preposition.
translation: Şu fiyata {ASSET_TYPE} {ITEM_NAME} satın almak ister misin:

description: Description text that is displayed after a purchase is completed.
Description text that is displayed when a player is prompted to purchase an item that costs more Robux than their current balance.
english: You need {NEEDED_AMOUNT} more Robux to buy the {ASSET_TYPE} {ITEM_NAME}. Would you like to buy more Robux?
translation: {ASSET_TYPE} {ITEM_NAME} satın almak için {NEEDED_AMOUNT} Robux'a daha ihtiyacın var. Daha fazla Robux satın almak ister misin?

description: This term is used to describe a Developer Product (https://www.robloxdev.com/articles/Developer-Products-In-Game-Purchases) which is created by users to sell within their own games. It's used in the same way an AssetType (like TShirt, Hair Accessory, etc.) might be used to describe the sort of item a player is attempting to buy.
Describes a 'bundle' that is from the Catalog.
Clicking this button confirms that the user would like to cancel a subscription. As in, "yes, I would like to cancel this subscription."
This text shows over the progress bar during a subscription cancellation. As in, "the system is canceling your subscription."
This message shows if a developer mistakenly prompts a user to cancel a subscription that they aren't currently paying for.
english: You aren't currently renewing this subscription. Your subscriptions have not changed.
translation: Şimdilik bu aboneliği yenilemiyorsun. Aboneliklerin değişmedi.

description: This message shows when a user successfully cancels a subscription. They get to keep their benefits for the rest of the remaining duration of their subscription, which is what the second part of the message describes.
english: You've canceled your {ITEM_NAME} subscription. You will retain your benefits until the end of the pay period.
translation: {ITEM_NAME} aboneliğini iptal ettin. Ödeme döneminin sonuna kadar avantajlarından faydalanmaya devam edeceksin.

description: This message is shown when the user is prompted to cancel a subscription. They get to keep their benefits until the end of the period they paid for, which is what the second part of the message describes.
english: Are you sure you would like to cancel your {ITEM_NAME} subscription? You will retain your benefits until the end of the pay period.
translation: {ITEM_NAME} aboneliğini iptal etmek istediğinden emin misin? Ödeme döneminin sonuna kadar avantajlarından faydalanmaya devam edeceksin.

description: This message is shown to a user when they are prompted to start a subscription.
english: Want to subscribe to the subscription {ITEM_NAME} for
translation: Şu fiyata {ITEM_NAME} aboneliğine abone olmak ister misin:

description: A word talking about subscriptions. As in, "would you like to subscribe to this Subscription?"
Communicates that the subscription will cost {PRICE} R$ per month. As in, "you will pay {PRICE} R$ per month until you cancel."
Price that's paid right now without a repeating interval. Probably doesn't need to be translated.
Labels the button that a user clicks to subscribe. As in, "Yes, I would like to subscribe to this subscription plan."
Additional detail text displayed when a player attempts to subscribe to a developer subscription plan, however is not subscribed to Premium.
english: You must be a Premium member in order to subscribe!
translation: Abone olmak için Premium üye olmalısın!

description: DEPRECATED - Confirm Button: when a player is not a premium member, the confirm button will display this string and trigger the Premium upsell flow

english: Your purchase failed because you need to be a Premium member to subscribe. Your account has not been charged
translation: Abone olmak için Premium üye olman gerektiğinden satın alma işlemin başarısız oldu. Hesabından ücret alınmadı

english: Your balance after this transaction will be {BALANCE_FUTURE} Robux
translation: Bu işlemden sonra bakiyen {BALANCE_FUTURE} Robux olacak

description: Description text displayed on mobile and console, when a product costs more than any native purchase would provide. For example, an item costing 4000 robux is more expensive than any of our native Robux packages.
english: This item cost more Robux than you have available.
translation: Bu öğenin fiyatı, sahip olduğun Robux'tan daha fazla.

english: You need to have Roblox Premium in order to purchase this item.
translation: Bu öğeyi satın almak için Roblox Premium'a sahip olman gerekir.

description: Text shown to users under 13 when they are prompted to buy robux in order to buy an item.
english: This purchase involves the exchange of real money. I agree that I am at least 18 years of age, and am the parent or legal guardian of the account owner. I authorize this purchase and agree to the Terms of Use.
translation: Bu satın alma işlemi, gerçek para ile gerçekleşir. En az 18 yaşında olduğumu ve hesap sahibinin ebeveyni veya yasal vasisi olduğumu kabul ediyorum. Bu satın alma işlemine izin veriyorum ve Kullanım Koşullarını kabul ediyorum.

description: Shown to users under 13 when they hit the first purchase threshold.
english: This purchase involves the exchange of real money.   I agree that I am at least 18 years of age, and am the parent or legal guardian of the account owner. I authorize this purchase and agree to the Terms of Use.
translation:
Bu satın alma işlemi, gerçek para ile gerçekleşir. 

En az 18 yaşında olduğumu ve hesap sahibinin ebeveyni veya yasal vasisi olduğumu kabul ediyorum. Bu satın alma işlemine izin veriyorum ve Kullanım Koşullarını kabul ediyorum.

description: Shown to users under 13 when they hit the second purchase threshold.
english: You've spent a lot on Roblox this month. Do you want to proceed? This purchase involves the exchange of real money. You must be the parent or legal guardian of the account owner to authorize this purchase.
translation: Bu ay Roblox'ta çok para harcadın. Devam etmek istiyor musun? Bu satın alma işlemi, gerçek para ile gerçekleşir. Bu satın alma işlemine izin vermek için hesap sahibinin ebeveyni veya yasal vasisi olman gerekir.

description: Shown to users under 13 when they hit the third purchase threshold and have parental email enabled.
english: You've spent a lot on Roblox this month. Receipts will be sent to the verified parental email on this account for this and all subsequent purchases.
translation: Bu ay Roblox'ta çok para harcadın. Bu ve sonraki tüm satın alma işlemlerinin makbuzları bu hesaptaki doğrulanmış ebeveyn e-posta adresine gönderilecektir.

english: This item can not be sold in this experience. Your account has not been charged.
translation: Bu öğe bu deneyimde satılamıyor. Hesabından ücret alınmadı.

description: Title of the alert modal

english: 2-Step Verification is required to make further transactions. Go to Settings > Security to complete 2-Step Verification.
translation: Daha fazla işlem yapabilmek için 2 Aşamalı Doğrulama gerekiyor. 2 Aşamalı Doğrulamayı tamamlamak için Ayarlar > Güvenlik menüsüne git.

description: Title of prompt informing the user they must enable 2SV
Button on modal to open up security settings after being told to enable 2SV

english: 2-Step Verification is required to make further transactions. Go to Settings > Security to complete 2-Step Verification. Enabling 2-Step Verification will log you out of your current session.
translation: Daha fazla işlem yapabilmek için 2 Aşamalı Doğrulama gerekiyor. 2 Aşamalı Doğrulamayı tamamlamak için Ayarlar > Güvenlik menüsüne git. 2 Aşamalı Doğrulamayı etkinleştirdiğinde mevcut oturumundan çıkış yapılır.

description: Purchase reached the limit of how many items the user can own.
english: Whoops! The creator has limits on how many copies a single user can purchase from them.
translation: Hop! İçerik yaratıcısının, tek bir kullanıcının kendisinden satın alabileceği kopya sayısı konusunda sınırlamaları var.

english: You're going too fast! Try again in a minute.
translation: Çok hızlı gidiyorsun! Bir dakika sonra tekrar dene.

description: Label applied to sponsored experiences / avatar items / groups etc
Label for an advertisement

english: AdGui's Adornee is not in Block shape
AdPortal doesn't have correct properties set
AdPortal parent part doesn't have correct properties set
translation: AdPortal parent part için doğru özellikler ayarlanmamış

english: AdGui's Adornee is not a Part

description: Shown at the top of a list to indicate what buying premium will grant the player.
First bullet explaining benefits of premium
Second bullet explaining benefits of premium
Third bullet explaining benefits of premium
english: Access to exclusive and discounted items in avatar shop
translation: Avatar mağazasında özel ve indirimli öğelere erişim

description: Title of Modal
Text on button indicating to the user how much the subscription costs. {robux} is meant to be {cost}...

english: Subscribe for {currencySymbol}{price}/month. Cancel anytime. Roblox Terms of Use and Privacy Policy apply.
translation: Aylık {price}{currencySymbol} karşılığında abone ol. İstediğin zaman iptal et. Roblox Kullanım Koşulları ve Gizlilik Politikası geçerlidir.

description: Text that will be read by screen readers when a verified badge is present next to a name.
This is text that will be read by screen readers when the premium badge is present next to a creators name
Info that will be displayed in a modal if the verified badge is clicked
english: This badge verifies that the holder is a notable and authentic creator, brand, or public figure.
translation: Bu rozet, sahibinin dikkate değer ve özgün bir yaratıcı, marka veya tanınmış bir kişi olduğunu doğrular.

description: Text for a link to “Learn More” about Verified Badges
Text warning a user if they change their username they will lose the verified badge
english:
Important: This change will result in the loss of your verified badge.

Your original account creation date will carry over to your new username.
translation:
Önemli: Bu değişiklik, doğrulanmış rozetini kaybetmene neden olur.

Orijinal hesap oluşturma tarihin yeni kullanıcı adına aktarılacak.

description: Text explaining to the user if they change their display name they will lose their Verified Badge
english:
Important: This change will result in the loss of your verified badge.

Your display name can only be changed once every 7 days.
translation:
Önemli: Bu değişiklik, doğrulanmış rozetini kaybetmene neden olur.

Görünen adın yalnızca 7 günde bir kez değiştirilebilir.

description: Warning displayed to users in a confirmation modal that taking this action will remove their verified badge.
english: The verified badge will be removed.

description: A warning displayed to users telling them turning off 2FA verification will result in them losing their verified badges
A warning displayed to users telling them turning off 2FA verification will result in them losing their verified badges
english: Disabling 2-Step Verification will result in the loss of your verified badge and make your account less secure. Are you sure you want to proceed?
translation: 2 Aşamalı Doğrulamanın devre dışı bırakılması, doğrulanmış rozetini kaybetmene neden olur ve hesabının güvenliğini azalır. Devam etmek istediğine emin misin?

description: Text that will be displayed as the title for a modal that gives the user more information about what the Verified Badge is
A warning to a user if they try to change their group name that they will lose the verified badge.
english: the verified badge will be removed.

description: A button that can be clicked to close a modal

english: This experience supports spatial voice chat. To use this feature, you need to verify you are at least 13 years old.
translation: Bu deneyim, konumsal sesli sohbeti destekler. Bu özelliği kullanabilmek için en az 13 yaşında olduğunu doğrulaman gerekiyor.

description: Heading of a modal that asks a user if they want to opt into voice chat after verifying their age
Subtext of a modal that asks a user if they want to opt into voice chat after verifying their age
english: This experience uses voice chat. Enabling voice chat will use your microphone input in voice enabled experiences.
translation: Bu deneyimde sesli sohbet kullanılır. Sesli sohbeti etkinleştirmek, sesin etkin olduğu deneyimlerde mikrofon girişini kullanır.

description: Subtext of a modal that asks a user if they want to opt into voice chat after verifying their age
english: You can also toggle this feature on or off by accessing your Settings.
translation: Bu özelliği Ayarlarına erişerek de açabilir veya kapatabilirsin.

description: Text on a button of a modal that asks a user if they want to opt into voice chat after verifying their age
exact same as Label.LearnMoreAboutVoiceRecording in Feature.AccountSettings
translation: Ses Kaydı Hakkında Daha Fazla Bilgi Edin

description: USED FOR AUTOMATED TESTING. PLEASE IGNORE
USED FOR AUTOMATED TESTING. PLEASE IGNORE
Describes the Preferred Transparency user setting
english: Improve contrast by adjusting transparency on some backgrounds
translation: Bazı arka planlarda şeffaflığı ayarlayarak kontrastı arttır

description: Describes the Reduce Motion user setting
Describes the Ui Navigation Toggle user setting
english: Use the {uiNavigationKey} key to enter and exit UI navigation mode
translation: Kullanıcı Arayüzü navigasyon moduna girmek ve çıkmak için {uiNavigationKey} tuşunu kullan

description: Label for the Background Transparency user setting slider
Label for the Reduce Motion user setting toggle
Label for the Enable UI Navigation Toggle user setting toggle
Label for the background transparency slider
Label for the background transparency slider
Title for a Modal asking the user if they want to purchase the item.
Prompt main text asking the user if they want to buy an item.
Footer text at the bottom of the modal, use to tell the user their balance after the purchase. The robux amount will be shown after the text.
english: Your balance after this transaction will be

description: Text on the button to cancel the purchase
Title of a modal trying to sell an item and buying robux to be able to buy the item.
Main text on the modal asking the user to buy robux to buy the item. Robux amount will displayed after this text

english: Your payment method will be charged.

description: Text shown on the footer explaining how much robux will be used + how much will be left over after the purchase added to the balance.
english: The remaining {robux} will be credited to your balance.

description: Text on button to cancel the purchase
This message will be shown when screentime heartbeat http call fails for 3 times consecutively.
english: Internal Error. Please try login again.
translation: İç hata. Lütfen tekrar giriş yapmayı dene.

description: Text for a success toast when a friend has been added
Text for toast when a friend request has been ignored

english: Waiting for Robux to be granted...
Waiting for Robux to be granted...
You don't have enough Robux to buy this item.
translation: Bu öğeyi satın almak için yeterli Robux'ın yok.

english: You need additional {robux}. Please purchase more Robux Packages then come back to the experience.
translation: {robux} Robux'a daha ihtiyacın var. Lütfen daha fazla Robux Paketi satın alıp deneyime dön.

english: Robux allows you to purchase upgrades for your avatar or buy special abilities in experiences
translation: Robux, avatarın için yükseltmeler satın almana veya deneyimlerde özel yetenekler satın almana olanak tanır

description: It is used to describe to the user how much more robux they are receiving because they purchased a larger package.
Header text for the two-step verification required modal.
Body text for the two-step verification challenge modal.
english: You must set up 2-Step Verification to complete this action. This will help protect your login, purchases, and more.
translation: Bu işlemi tamamlamak için 2 Aşamalı Doğrulamayı ayarlaman gerekiyor. Bu eylem; giriş bilgilerini, satın alımlarını ve daha fazlasını korumana yardımcı olacak.

description: Button text for the two-step verification challenge.

english: Are you sure you want to leave and join another experience?
translation: Bu deneyimden ayrılıp başka bir deneyime katılmak istediğine emin misin?

description: Set Up is the action button text in the challenge modal.
Body text of the two-step verification challenge modal.
english: You must set up 2-Step Verification to complete this action. This will help protect your login, purchases, and more.
translation: Bu işlemi tamamlamak için 2 Aşamalı Doğrulamayı ayarlaman gerekiyor. Bu eylem; giriş bilgilerini, satın alımlarını ve daha fazlasını korumana yardımcı olacak.

description: Header text for the two-step verification challenge modal.
Title text of modal when gamepad is disconnected
Message of gamepad disconnect modal. First string replacement is user name and second is the button to press
english: Controller for user "%s" has been disconnected, please press '%s' on the controller you would like to continue with.
translation: "%s" adlı kullanıcının oyun kumandası bağlantısı kesildi, lütfen kullanmak istediğin oyun kumandasında "%s" tuşuna bas.
